channel.title: SitScape 317 Spawn/PK
channel.description:
Hello, this is my advertisement thread for my new server, SitScape-PK. [size=12pt]Website - www.sitscapepk.com Forums - www.sitscapepk.com[/size] [center] [size=18pt]- Features -[/size]
[size=14pt]- Change your combat stats by clicking the skill - Skilling added to get coins so PKing isn't the only way to make money - Custom Quests - Nice custom items - Working Vote4rewards & auto donations system - New bank interface - Hosted VPS 24/7 - Make your own custom loadout! (Video scroll down) - Hunger games minigame, last one standing! - Working Fight pits - PVM Added, godwars, donator zone npcs - Get pkp items - Working clan chats - Working KDR - Working private messaging - Added loyalty titles and rank titles - Achievement tab has Item kits to spawn for armours - Perfect Switching - Great combat - PKpoint shop - Lottery (winner is drawn at 300PKP pot) - 55X2 hoster npc & blackjack - Working duel arena with option to use whip & dds only - Working rocktails - Donator shop - Vote point shop - Statius, Vestas, Zuriels, Morrigans - Dwarf multicannon to help with PVM ------ AND MUCH MORE------[/size]
[/center] Media - Gyazo [spoiler] New bank interface and customs http://gyazo.com/2839335cc5148d59660c25516d0f040c Clan chats http://gyazo.com/9762e4a01c67843cba362d2798520977 Dwarf Multicannon http://gyazo.com/ef957b6a05f86ded1070cae1c2c73b3f Godwars http://gyazo.com/9290a011cb3b7a617357f8e7371b3ad5 Gambling NPC http://gyazo.com/245b8398f6d2aa329ec878cd40e3b7fc http://gyazo.com/e8244bb7d559803dbe3c264a204a6975 http://gyazo.com/bc7a49a66f6de373e96a4edfb6f09542 PKP SHOP http://gyazo.com/c156d085d1adf616599bbd0a392ca12a [/spoiler] [center] Video of making your own custom loadout! [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uGAuQuSNTJE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [/center]

item.title: SitScape 317 Spawn/PK
item.dc:creator: @callen415 callen415
item.description:
@callen415 wrote:

BUMP GREAT SERVER JON NOW YOU WONT REGRET!!! ALL join sitscapepk.com Number 1 spawn/eco server out there. Great community and Staff both are active. We are a brand new server so lots of good things are coming so come join to be a part of it sitscapepk.com - Vladen
